channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
@TommyBeer What we want as Knicks fans is to love the team.

If you thought Knicks fans want to WIN where have you been for the last 20 years!
item.source:markdown:
@TommyBeer What we want as Knicks fans is to love the team.
If you thought Knicks fans want to WIN where have you been for the last 20 years!

item.description: @marcedavis @PovlAage It's a muscle car. I don't think they get that.
item.source:markdown: @marcedavis @PovlAage It's a muscle car. I don't think they get that.

item.description:
@PovlAage @marcedavis Not sure which kinks you're talking about, but my Tesla as a car works flawlessly. The computer system can be pretty fucked up, the same way Macs are because Tesla did more than make an EV.

I also have a ICE, a relatively new Subaru and as you say it's incredibly reliable too.

@PovlAage @marcedavis That said, I never drive the Subaru. It's sitting there waiting for winter, my thought is that it might work better in the snow than the Tesla. But I literally drive it because the Tesla is so much more fun to drive. ;-)

@PovlAage @marcedavis That said, I never drive the Subaru. It's sitting there waiting for winter, my thought is that it might work better in the snow than the Tesla. But I literally NEVER drive the Subaru because the Tesla is so much more fun to drive. ;-)

item.description:
@Gartenberg I'd love to see your subscription list..

I'm working in this area now, doing a new feed reader, and I am collecting good feeds.

item.description: 2012: Web 2.0, while it started out as a freedom-inspiring thing, has been coalescing to being a dangerous form of locking-in the user's data so it can be applied to a corporate business model. https://t.co/VRxBaLuAyN

item.description: It's so cold I'm wearing a sweatshirt this morning. It's freaking me out. Summer just started. It can't be over so soon! Ohhh. Help.
item.source:markdown: It's so cold I'm wearing a sweatshirt this morning. It's freaking me out. Summer just started. It can't be over so soon! Ohhh. Help.

item.description: When Kevin Durant said the Knicks weren't cool, the Knicks immediately became the coolest team in the NBA.
